Reference

Use of risk functions

RRFunc()

Individual relative risks of disease

subgroupRisk()

Summarise relative risk

PAFcalc()

Calculate Population Attributable Fractions

Tobacco relative risks

Disease definitions and relative risks

RRtob()

Tobacco relative risks

RRTobDR()

Dose-response relative risks for tobacco-related cancers

tob_disease_names

Names of tobacco-related diseases

tob_icd10_lookups

Diseases related to tobacco and their ICD-10 definitions

tobacco_relative_risks

Tobacco relative risks

Tobacco lag times

TobLags()

Tobacco lag times

tobacco_lag_times

Tobacco lag times

Alcohol relative risks

Disease definitions and relative risks

RRalc()

Relative risks for alcohol related diseases

alc_disease_names

Names of alcohol-related diseases

alc_icd10_lookups

Diseases related to alcohol and their ICD-10 definitions

Disease risk linked to intoxication

AlcBinge()

Calculate variables to inform alcohol binge model

AlcBinge_stapm()

Calculate variables to inform alcohol binge model - STAPM version

PArisk()

Relative risks for alcohol-related injuries

WArisk_acute()

Risk of acute conditions wholly-attributable to alcohol

binge_params

Parameters to estimate amount drunk on single occasions

binge_params_stapm

Parameters to estimate amount drunk on single occasions - England - STAPM version

binge_params_stapm_scot

Parameters to estimate amount drunk on single occasions - Scotland - STAPM version

Alcohol lag times

AlcLags()

Alcohol lag times

Joint tobacco and alcohol risk

TobAlcInt()

Risk interaction between tobacco and alcohol

tob_alc_risk_int

Synergistic effects of tobacco and alcohol risks

tobalc_icd10_lookups

Diseases related to both tobacco and alcohol and their ICD-10 definitions

Misc

ExpandCodes()

Convert groups of ICD-10 codes to single codes

disease_groups

Groupings of diseases into disease types

intervalprob()

Distribution of single-occasion drinking amount
